name: #ExtinctAnimals No.03 The Last Giant Short-faced Bear (mp4)
description:
Arctodus simus. Extinct. Pleistocene. North America.
“The Giant short-faced was a brutish predator that overwhelmed other large mammals of the Pleistocene with its great physical strength.”

Using steganography, each frame of this mp4 file has been encoded with a segment of the sequenced DNA of the Giant Short-faced Bear. This video therefore hides the genetic code of the animal within.
